Name: Poké Ball
Description: You may obtain (at most) 1 of 2 random pokemon.

Name: Great Ball
Description: You may obtain (at most) 1 of 3 random pokemon.

Name: Ultra Ball
Description: You may obtain (at most) 1 of 4 random pokemon.

Name: Rare Candy
Description: Increase a Pokemon's level by one.

Name: HP Max
Description: Set a Pokemon's HP EV to 252. (Can't go above 508 total EVs.)

Name: Max Protein
Description: Set a Pokemon's Atk EV to 252. (Can't go above 508 total EVs.)
